about_the_game:
Welcome, my child, to this world. Time is fleeting, so listen closely.

You shall be known as Zephon, the Guardian of the Order of Four. As a representative of the Guardians, your duty is to protect all living beings in this realm.

Harness the might of the elemental forces

Although we cannot spare the time for extensive training, do not despair. Your brethren—the representatives from the Builders and Scholars—have combined their strengths to forge this remarkable armor for you. With it, you will absorb my core essence: the Arcane Power. This power allows you to channel the elemental forces of Fire, Water, Earth, and Air, each capable of unleashing devastating abilities.

Vanquish your enemies

Now, to your mission. You have entered a world on the brink of collapse—a realm that has shattered into small, floating islands as a consequence of my dwindling strength. An insidious alien force has learned to exploit my powers and has sent its minions to harm my children. Only a few of them remain, and as the last Guardian, it is your duty to protect your siblings. You are my last hope. Embrace the armor and channel my powers through it. Master these interconnected elements, as they will grant you unique advantages against your foes, depending on how you wield them.

Uncover the secrets of the fading world and unlock your true strength

However, the armor is not yet at its full potential; it requires further strengthening. To unlock greater knowledge and power, you must venture forth and seize every opportunity to grow stronger. Along your journey, you will encounter various challenges that will lead you to chambers of wisdom left behind by your siblings.

Now, rise and embrace your destiny! This is your final stand against the forces that seek to obliterate all that remains.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Feature Level AMD or NVIDIA Card with 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: Step into the role of Zephon, the last Guardian, in this third-person action-adventure. Explore the ruins of a once-thriving realm and harness its raw power, channeling it into the elemental forces of Fire, Water, Earth, and Air to defeat the intruders threatening the world’s final collapse.
